Posts.Content: thanks Sue. I think I will show my Mom to a good psychiatrist. I hope he helps. She was diagnosed for breast cancer 4 years back. She is treated successfully but just these issues like fatigue and aggresiveness and having doubt on everyone is making us worried.  Thanks for your help.
Posts.Title: Mental disorder post treatment of Breast cancer

Posts.Content: My mother aged 60 went through surgery, Chemo and radiotherapy for Breast Cancer. She was taking Anaztrazole post treatment. its her 4 year post treatment. Her behavior has changed post treatment and continues to worsen.  She gets aggresive over all little things and doesnt want to cook at all. She is also diagnosed with Type 2 diabetes recently. She keeps doubting that someone is planning strategy for her all time. Please help. My home is ruined with all this. we care lot for her. and want to see her happy again.
Posts.Title: Mental disorder post treatment of Breast cancer
